title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and parmesan. Combine everything with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chunks of chicken enveloped in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Fry onion, add tomato puree and cream, then add chicken.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish packed with colorful vegetables and soy sauce.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, olive oil, and a sprinkle of salt.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican-style tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
